thought: what if i have nothing to say, what if we don't click anymore, what if this goes badly.
label: fortune telling,catastrophizing

query:
situation: I found a job I thought was perfect for me in the field I used to work in and love very much. A few days after putting in a resume and lining up several references, I found out the job was filled and I didn't even get so much as an acknowledgment of my application much less an interview when I was extremely qualified.
thought: why can't I ever get anything I want
label: all-or-nothing thinking,overgeneralization

query:
situation: i celebrated a past holiday by myself
thought: why don't i have friends? why am i not social? SIGH!
label: all-or-nothing thinking,overgeneralization

query:
situation: My daughter's illness
thought: worry about a disabled family member
label: negative feeling or emotion,none
